input.sentences: this year 's fireworks display was very well done .
we went down to the city early to get a good spot for watching .
some of the fireworks were even being set off from some of the buildings .
we thought it was hard to tell when it was over because almost every display looked like a 'grand finale ' .
when it finally ended though | it was pretty obvious ; the noise was deafening and then just silence before everyone started applauding .
output.sentences: The fireworks are a marvel to behold.
The red and yellow colors erupt in the night sky.
The fireworks brighten the dark sky.
The fireworks were fun to watch.
